Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Cationic peptide that possess multiple functions. It acts as a cell-penetrating peptide (CPP), and as a potent voltage- gated potassium channel (Kv) inhibitor. It exhibits antimicrobial activities, hind limb paralysis, and severe muscle necrosis by a non-enzymatic mechanism (By similarity).(Ref.2)
Sequence Information.Toxic Dose: LD(50) is 3.0 mg/kg by intramuscular injection.

Literature.Title: Structure-function relationship of myotoxin a using peptide fragments.
